name: VaMoose (glagha)
description:
Desert Bus 2022 Game Jam submission. Theme: The Anti-Bus

Jormoosegandr, vengeful moosey guardian of the woods and friend to all living creatures has seen one too many of his small bug friends mercilessly smashed on the windshields of the hateful bus hordes, and now takes matters into his own hooves.  Channeling the spirit of the Negabus, he will stop them once and for all.

Rules:

Arrow keys/WASD to move

Space to deploy negabus

Escape to quit

To properly destroy a bus, both the front and back must be crushed. Smash your mighty antlers into both the front and back half of a bus to take it down for good. Forest law states that while busses of all types are open season, "innocent" vehicles are off limits. Damaging too many will end your mission early.  (Their time will come another day.) Recover the splattered bodies of your bug friends to fuel your vengeful power and summon the negabus to destroy all vehicles on screen.

Game by Glagha

Art by Jexebele
